name: Harris Bipod Hb 6-9In S-Brm S-Brm Camera Stand
categoryPath: Sports & Outdoors/Outdoor Sports/Shooting/Firearm Components/Gun Stocks & Grips

reviews.name: Harris Model BRM Series S 6"-9" Bipod
reviews.reviewText:
This is a great bipod. It is solid and gives the rifle good support. Just remember to purchase a toggle handle to lock it in place. It would be nice if it came with the handle but not so much.
Once you have the handle installed this is a great tool for improving your long range game both sitting at the table and prone.
reviews.title: Long Range Shooting

reviews.name: Harris Model BRM Series S 6"-9" Bipod
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for this specific bipod and found it at WalMart.com. High Quality Harris 6-9" BRM. Online order process was smooth and Delivery was quick. Thanks!
reviews.title: Quality Bipod at a Great Price

reviews.name: Harris Model BRM Series S 6"-9" Bipod
reviews.reviewText: Harris bi pods have been the best for years and this one still is. great for bench shooting
reviews.title: great as always
